text:
Does anybody doubt Trump would pretend his administration had just presided over the discovery of a perfect vaccine in October even if it was a total lie? That he’d get the FDA to back him up despite its supposed independence? I have no doubt at all. 

https://t.co/LLehL1wiQ7
